Lodash æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸€è‡´æ€§ã€æ¨¡å—åŒ–ã€é«˜æ€§èƒ½çš„ JavaScript å®ç”¨å·¥å…·åº“ã€‚

ç”±äº Lodash å®˜ç½‘ api æè¿°æ–‡å­—è‰°æ·±æ™¦æ¶©ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡æ„æ—¨ç”¨é€šä¿—çš„è¯­è¨€æ¦‚æ‹¬ lodash api çš„å«ä¹‰ï¼Œè®©åˆšæ¥è§¦ lodash çš„å¼€å‘è€…å¿«é€Ÿæ‰¾åˆ°é€‚ç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆåªè¦çœ‹ç›®å½•å°±çŸ¥é“å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨äº† ğŸ˜ï¼‰ã€‚

è¯¥ç¯‡æ‰€ç½—åˆ— api æ˜¯ç»è¿‡ç¬”è€…ç­›é€‰å¹³æ—¥ä½¿ç”¨é¢‘ç‡è¾ƒé«˜ï¼Œå¹¶å‰”é™¤ ES6 å·²å®ç°çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚

Lodash å®˜ç½‘

Array â€‹

æŸ¥æ‰¾ â€‹

è¿”å›éšæœºå…ƒç´  â€”â€” sample(collection) â€‹

å•ä¸ªéšæœºæ•°

js
_.sample([1, 2, 3, 4]);
// => 2

å¤šä¸ªéšæœºæ•° sampleSize(collection, [n=1])

js
_.sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 2);
// => [3, 1]

_.sampleSize([1, 2, 3], 4);
// => [2, 3, 1]

æŸ¥æ‰¾å¹¶è¿”å›ç´¢å¼• â€”â€” findIndex(array, [predicate=_.identity], [fromIndex=0]) â€‹

ä»å‰å¾€åæŸ¥ findIndex

js
var users = [
  { user: "barney", active: false },
  { user: "fred", active: false },
  { user: "pebbles", active: true },
];

// å¯¹è±¡æŒ‡å®škeyå€¼æŸ¥æ‰¾
// The `_.matchesProperty` iteratee shorthand.
_.findIndex(users, ["user", "fred"]);
// => 1

// å¯¹è±¡æ·±åŒ¹é…æŸ¥æ‰¾
// The `_.matches` iteratee shorthand.
_.findIndex(users, { user: "fred", active: false });
// => 1

// æŒ‡å®škeyæŸ¥æ‰¾
// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.findIndex(users, "active");
// => 2

// å‡½æ•°æŸ¥æ‰¾
_.findIndex(users, function (o) {
  return o.user == "barney";
});
// => 0

ä»å°¾éƒ¨å¾€å‰æŸ¥ findLastIndex(array, [predicate=_.identity], [fromIndex=array.length-1])

ä¿®æ”¹ â€‹

å¡«å……æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®ä¸ºæŒ‡å®šå€¼ â€”â€” fill(array, value, [start=0], [end=array.length]) â€‹

js
var array = [1, 2, 3];

_.fill(array, "a");
console.log(array);
// => ['a', 'a', 'a']

_.fill(Array(3), 2);
// => [2, 2, 2]

_.fill([4, 6, 8, 10], "*", 1, 3);
// => [4, '*', '*', 10]

åˆ é™¤æŒ‡å®šçš„å¤šä¸ªå…ƒç´  â€”â€” remove(array, [predicate=_.identity]) â€‹

æœ€çµæ´»

remove(array, [predicate=_.identity]) åˆ é™¤è¿­ä»£å‡½æ•°è¿”å› true çš„é¡¹ï¼Œå‡½æ•°è¿”å›è¢«åˆ å…ƒç´ æ•°ç»„

js
var array = [1, 2, 3, 4];
var evens = _.remove(array, function (n) {
  return n % 2 == 0;
});

console.log(array);
// => [1, 3]

console.log(evens);
// => [2, 4]

ç®€å•ç±»å‹

pull(array, [values]) æŒ‡å®šå¤šä¸ªå…¥å‚æ–¹å¼

js
var array = [1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3];

_.pull(array, 2, 3);
console.log(array);
// => [1, 1]

pullAll(array, values) æŒ‡å®šæ•°ç»„æ–¹å¼

js
var array = [1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3];

_.pullAll(array, [2, 3]);
console.log(array);
// => [1, 1]

å¤æ‚ç±»å‹

pullAllBy(array, values, [iteratee=_.identity]) æ ¹æ®æŒ‡å®šæ¡ä»¶åˆ é™¤é¡¹

js
var array = [{ x: 1 }, { x: 2 }, { x: 3 }, { x: 1 }];

_.pullAllBy(array, [{ x: 1 }, { x: 3 }], "x");
console.log(array);
// => [{ 'x': 2 }]

pullAllWith(array, values, [comparator]) æ ¹æ®å¯¹è±¡å€¼åˆ é™¤å¯¹è±¡

js
var array = [
  { x: 1, y: 2 },
  { x: 3, y: 4 },
  { x: 5, y: 6 },
];

_.pullAllWith(array, [{ x: 3, y: 4 }], _.isEqual);
console.log(array);
// => [{ 'x': 1, 'y': 2 }, { 'x': 5, 'y': 6 }]

æ ¹æ®ç´¢å¼•åˆ é™¤

_.pullAt(array, [indexes]) æ ¹æ®ç´¢å¼•åˆ é™¤ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›è¢«åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ ç»„æˆçš„æ•°ç»„

js
var array = [5, 10, 15, 20];
var evens = _.pullAt(array, 1, 3);

console.log(array);
// => [5, 15]

console.log(evens);
// => [10, 20]

è¿‡æ»¤ â€‹

è¿‡æ»¤æ•°ç»„ â€”â€” filter(collection, [predicate=_.identity]) â€‹

è¿‡æ»¤è¿”å›åŒ¹é…çš„å…ƒç´ 

ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼šlodash çš„ filter æ¯”åŸç”Ÿ filter æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šç®€å†™

js
var users = [
  { user: "barney", age: 36, active: true },
  { user: "fred", age: 40, active: false },
];

_.filter(users, function (o) {
  return !o.active;
});
// => objects for ['fred']

// The `_.matches` iteratee shorthand.
_.filter(users, { age: 36, active: true });
// => objects for ['barney']

// The `_.matchesProperty` iteratee shorthand.
_.filter(users, ["active", false]);
// => objects for ['fred']

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.filter(users, "active");
// => objects for ['barney']

è¿‡æ»¤è¿”å›æœªåŒ¹é…çš„å…ƒç´ 

difference(array, [values])

ç®€å•ç±»å‹

js
_.difference([3, 2, 1], [4, 2]);
// => [3, 1]

å¤æ‚ç±»å‹

differenceBy(array, [values], [iteratee=_.identity])

js
_.differenceBy([3.1, 2.2, 1.3], [4.4, 2.5], Math.floor);
// => [3.1, 1.3]

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.differenceBy([{ x: 2 }, { x: 1 }], [{ x: 1 }], "x");
// => [{ 'x': 2 }]

è·å–åˆ°ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶ã€ä¸ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„å…ƒç´  â€”â€” partition(collection, [predicate=_.identity]) â€‹

js
var users = [
  { user: "barney", age: 36, active: false },
  { user: "fred", age: 40, active: true },
  { user: "pebbles", age: 1, active: false },
];

_.partition(users, function (o) {
  return o.active;
});
// => objects for [['fred'], ['barney', 'pebbles']]

// The `_.matches` iteratee shorthand.
_.partition(users, { age: 1, active: false });
// => objects for [['pebbles'], ['barney', 'fred']]

// The `_.matchesProperty` iteratee shorthand.
_.partition(users, ["active", false]);
// => objects for [['barney', 'pebbles'], ['fred']]

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.partition(users, "active");
// => objects for [['fred'], ['barney', 'pebbles']]

è·å–æŒ‡å®šå€¼ä»¥å¤–çš„å…ƒç´  â€”â€” without(array, [values]) â€‹

ä¸ä¼šä¿®æ”¹åŸæ•°ç»„

js
_.without([2, 1, 2, 3], 1, 2);
// => [3]

var array = [
  { c: 6, x: 2 },
  { c: 6, x: 3 },
];

without(array, array[0]);
// => [{ c: 6, x: 3 }]

å»é‡ â€”â€” uniqBy(array, [iteratee=_.identity]) â€‹

æŒ‡å®šå¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„ key å»é‡

js
_.uniqBy(
  [
    { x: 1, y: 2 },
    { x: 1, y: 4 },
  ],
  "x"
);
// => [{ x: 1, y: 2 }]

uniqWith(array, [comparator]) æ·±åº¦æ¯”è¾ƒå¯¹è±¡å»é‡

js
var objects = [
  { x: 1, y: 2 },
  { x: 2, y: 1 },
  { x: 1, y: 2 },
];

_.uniqWith(objects, _.isEqual);
// => [{ 'x': 1, 'y': 2 }, { 'x': 2, 'y': 1 }]

è¿”å›å¤šä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„äº¤é›† â€”â€” intersection([arrays]) â€‹

ç®€å•ç±»å‹ intersection([arrays])

js
_.intersection([2, 1], [4, 2], [1, 2]);
// => [2]

å¤æ‚ç±»å‹ intersectionBy([arrays], [iteratee=_.identity])

js
_.intersectionBy([2.1, 1.2], [4.3, 2.4], Math.floor);
// => [2.1]

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.intersectionBy([{ x: 1 }], [{ x: 2 }, { x: 1 }], "x");
// => [{ 'x': 1 }]

æ’åº â€‹

æ’åº â€”â€” orderBy(collection, [iteratees=[_.identity]], [orders]) â€‹

js
var users = [
  { user: "fred", age: 48 },
  { user: "barney", age: 34 },
  { user: "fred", age: 40 },
  { user: "barney", age: 36 },
];

// ä»¥ `user` å‡åºæ’åº å†  `age` ä»¥é™åºæ’åºã€‚
_.orderBy(users, ["user", "age"], ["asc", "desc"]);
// => objects for [['barney', 36], ['barney', 34], ['fred', 48], ['fred', 40]]

ä¹±åº â€”â€” shuffle(collection) â€‹

js
_.shuffle([1, 2, 3, 4]);
// => [4, 1, 3, 2]

è½¬æ¢ â€‹

æŒ‰æŒ‡å®šé•¿åº¦æ‹†åˆ†æ•°ç»„ â€”â€” chunk(array, [size=1]) â€‹

å°†é”®å€¼å¯¹äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„è½¬ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡ â€”â€” fromPairs(pairs) â€‹

js
_.fromPairs([
  ["fred", 30],
  ["barney", 40],
]);
// => { 'fred': 30, 'barney': 40 }

å¯¹è±¡ â€‹

é€‰å–å±æ€§ç»„æˆæ–°å¯¹è±¡ â€”â€” pick(object, [props]) â€‹

js
var object = { a: 1, b: "2", c: 3 };

_.pick(object, ["a", "c"]);
// => { 'a': 1, 'c': 3 }

è‡ªå®šä¹‰æŒ‡å®šå±æ€§é€»è¾‘ ç”¨ pickBy(object, [predicate=_.identity])

js
var object = { a: 1, b: "2", c: 3 };

_.pickBy(object, _.isNumber);
// => { 'a': 1, 'c': 3 }

æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸åŒéƒ¨åˆ†æ‰€ç»„æˆçš„å¯¹è±¡

js
var oldObj = { a: 1, b: 2 };
var newObj = { a: 1, b: 3 };

pickBy(newObj, (val, key) => oldObj[key] !== val);
// => { b: 3 }

æœ‰åºéå†å¯¹è±¡ â€”â€” Object.entries + sortBy â€‹

Object.entries() æ˜¯ ES6 æ–°å¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæˆå‘˜æ˜¯å‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡è‡ªèº«çš„ï¼ˆä¸å«ç»§æ‰¿çš„ï¼‰æ‰€æœ‰å¯éå†ï¼ˆenumerableï¼‰å±æ€§çš„é”®å€¼å¯¹æ•°ç»„ã€‚

js
const obj = { foo: "bar", baz: 42 };
Object.entries(obj);
// [ ["foo", "bar"], ["baz", 42] ]

lodahs ä¸­çš„ sortBy(collection, [iteratees=[_.identity]]) ç”¨äºå¯¹é›†åˆæ’åºï¼Œé»˜è®¤å‡åºï¼Œå…·ä½“ä½¿ç”¨å¯æŸ¥çœ‹ é›†åˆ ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„ sortBy æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

æœ‰åºéå†å¯¹è±¡çš„å®ç°

js
function forInOrder(obj, callback) {
  const pairs = sortBy(Object.entries(obj), (item) => item[0]);
  pairs.some(([key, val]) => {
    return callback(key, val) === false;
  });
}

forInOrder({ b: 2, a: 1 }, (k, v) => console.log(k, v));
// => a 1
// => b 2

åˆ†æï¼š å…ˆç”¨ entries å°†å¯¹è±¡è½¬æ¢ä¸ºé”®å€¼å¯¹æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå†ç”¨ sortBy å¯¹æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼Œæœ€åå¯¹æ’åºåæ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œéå†å³å¯å®Œæˆæœ‰åºéå†å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

å‡½æ•° â€‹

é˜²æŠ– â€”â€” debounce(func, [wait=0], [options=]) â€‹

å»¶è¿Ÿ wait æ¯«ç§’åè°ƒç”¨ func æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè‹¥å»¶è¿ŸæœŸé—´å‡½æ•°è¢«è°ƒç”¨åˆ™æŒ‰ wait é‡ç½®å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´ã€‚

  1. func (Function): è¦é˜²æŠ–åŠ¨çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚
  2. [wait=0] (number): éœ€è¦å»¶è¿Ÿçš„æ¯«ç§’æ•°ã€‚
  3. [options=] (Object): é€‰é¡¹å¯¹è±¡ã€‚
  4. [options.leading=false] (boolean): æŒ‡å®šåœ¨å»¶è¿Ÿå¼€å§‹å‰è°ƒç”¨ã€‚
  5. [options.maxWait] (number): è®¾ç½® func å…è®¸è¢«å»¶è¿Ÿçš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚
  6. [options.trailing=true] (boolean): æŒ‡å®šåœ¨å»¶è¿Ÿç»“æŸåè°ƒç”¨ã€‚
js
// é¿å…çª—å£åœ¨å˜åŠ¨æ—¶å‡ºç°æ˜‚è´µçš„è®¡ç®—å¼€é”€ã€‚
jQuery(window).on("resize", _.debounce(calculateLayout, 150));

// å½“ç‚¹å‡»æ—¶ `sendMail` éšåå°±è¢«è°ƒç”¨ã€‚
jQuery(element).on(
  "click",
  _.debounce(sendMail, 300, {
    leading: true,
    trailing: false,
  })
);

// ç¡®ä¿ `batchLog` è°ƒç”¨1æ¬¡ä¹‹åï¼Œ1ç§’å†…ä¼šè¢«è§¦å‘ã€‚
var debounced = _.debounce(batchLog, 250, { maxWait: 1000 });
var source = new EventSource("/stream");
jQuery(source).on("message", debounced);

// å–æ¶ˆä¸€ä¸ª trailing çš„é˜²æŠ–åŠ¨è°ƒç”¨
jQuery(window).on("popstate", debounced.cancel);

èŠ‚æµ throttle(func, [wait=0], [options=]) â€‹

åœ¨ wait ç§’å†…æœ€å¤šæ‰§è¡Œ func ä¸€æ¬¡çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚

  1. func (Function): è¦èŠ‚æµçš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚
  2. [wait=0] (number): éœ€è¦èŠ‚æµçš„æ¯«ç§’ã€‚
  3. [options=] (Object): é€‰é¡¹å¯¹è±¡ã€‚
  4. [options.leading=true] (boolean): æŒ‡å®šè°ƒç”¨åœ¨èŠ‚æµå¼€å§‹å‰ã€‚
  5. [options.trailing=true] (boolean): æŒ‡å®šè°ƒç”¨åœ¨èŠ‚æµç»“æŸåã€‚
js
// é¿å…åœ¨æ»šåŠ¨æ—¶è¿‡åˆ†çš„æ›´æ–°å®šä½
jQuery(window).on("scroll", _.throttle(updatePosition, 100));

// ç‚¹å‡»åå°±è°ƒç”¨ `renewToken`ï¼Œä½†5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…è¶…è¿‡1æ¬¡ã€‚
var throttled = _.throttle(renewToken, 300000, { trailing: false });
jQuery(element).on("click", throttled);

// å–æ¶ˆä¸€ä¸ª trailing çš„èŠ‚æµè°ƒç”¨ã€‚
jQuery(window).on("popstate", throttled.cancel);

é™åˆ¶è°ƒç”¨æ¬¡æ•° â€”â€” before(n, func) â€‹

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè°ƒç”¨funcçš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œé™åˆ¶è°ƒç”¨æ¬¡æ•° < n æ¬¡ã€‚ ä¹‹åå†è°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå°†è¿”å›ä¸€æ¬¡æœ€åè°ƒç”¨funcçš„ç»“æœã€‚

js
const fn = before(2, (val) => {
  console.log("called");
  return val;
});
console.log(fn(1));
console.log(fn(2));

// => called, 1, 1

å‡½æ•°æŸ¯é‡ŒåŒ– â€”â€” curry(func, [arity=func.length]) â€‹

js
var abc = function (a, b, c) {
  return [a, b, c];
};

var curried = _.curry(abc);

curried(1)(2)(3);
// => [1, 2, 3]

curried(1, 2)(3);
// => [1, 2, 3]

curried(1, 2, 3);
// => [1, 2, 3]

// Curried with placeholders.
curried(1)(_, 3)(2);
// => [1, 2, 3]

é™åˆ¶åªèƒ½è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ â€”â€” once(func) â€‹

è¯­è¨€ç±»æ–¹æ³• â€‹

æ·±æ‹·è´ â€”â€” cloneDeep(value) â€‹

æ·±åº¦æ¯”è¾ƒå€¼ â€”â€” isEqual(value, other) â€‹

js
var object = { a: 1 };
var other = { a: 1 };

_.isEqual(object, other);
// => true

object === other;
// => false

åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å‡½æ•° â€”â€” isFunction(value) â€‹

æ•°å­¦ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ç²¾åº¦å‘ä¸‹ã€å‘ä¸Šèˆå…¥ â€”â€” floor(number, [precision=0]) â€‹

å‘ä¸‹èˆå…¥ floor(number, [precision=0])

js
_.floor(4.006);
// => 4

_.floor(0.046, 2);
// => 0.04

_.floor(4060, -2);
// => 4000

å‘ä¸Šèˆå…¥ ceil(number, [precision=0])

æ ¹æ®ç²¾åº¦å››èˆäº”å…¥ â€”â€” round(number, [precision=0]) â€‹

æŸ¥æ‰¾å¯¹è±¡æ•°ç»„æŒ‡å®š key å€¼æœ€å¤§çš„é¡¹ â€”â€” maxBy(array, [iteratee=_.identity]) â€‹

js
var objects = [{ n: 1 }, { n: 2 }];

_.maxBy(objects, function (o) {
  return o.n;
});
// => { 'n': 2 }

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.maxBy(objects, "n");
// => { 'n': 2 }

è®¡ç®—å¯¹è±¡æ•°ç»„æŒ‡å®š key å€¼çš„å’Œ â€”â€” sumBy(array, [iteratee=_.identity]) â€‹

js
var objects = [{ n: 4 }, { n: 2 }, { n: 8 }, { n: 6 }];

_.sumBy(objects, function (o) {
  return o.n;
});
// => 20

// The `_.property` iteratee shorthand.
_.sumBy(objects, "n");
// => 20

è¿”å›æŒ‡å®šèŒƒå›´éšæœºæ•° â€”â€” random([lower=0], [upper=1], [floating]) â€‹

js
_.random(0, 5);
// => an integer between 0 and 5

_.random(5);
// => also an integer between 0 and 5

_.random(5, true);
// => a floating-point number between 0 and 5

_.random(1.2, 5.2);
// => a floating-point number between 1.2 and 5.2

å­—ç¬¦ä¸² â€‹

è½¬é©¼å³°å†™æ³• â€”â€” camelCase([string='']) â€‹

js
_.camelCase("Foo Bar");
// => 'fooBar'

_.camelCase("--foo-bar--");
// => 'fooBar'

_.camelCase("__FOO_BAR__");
// => 'fooBar'

ç”¨æ­£åˆ™æ‹†åˆ†å­—ç¬¦ä¸² â€”â€” words([string=''], [pattern]) â€‹

js
_.words("fred, barney, & pebbles");
// => ['fred', 'barney', 'pebbles']

_.words("fred, barney, & pebbles", /[^, ]+/g);
// => ['fred', 'barney', '&', 'pebbles']

æˆªæ–­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼æº¢å‡ºéšè— â€”â€” truncate([string=''], [options=]) â€‹

  1. [string=''] (string): è¦æˆªæ–­çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚
  2. [options=] (Object): é€‰é¡¹å¯¹è±¡ã€‚
  3. [options.length=30] (number): å…è®¸çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ã€‚
  4. [options.omission='...'] (string): è¶…å‡ºåçš„ä»£æ›¿å­—ç¬¦ã€‚
  5. [options.separator] (RegExp|string): æˆªæ–­ç‚¹ã€‚
js
_.truncate("hi-diddly-ho there, neighborino");
// => 'hi-diddly-ho there, neighbo...'

_.truncate("hi-diddly-ho there, neighborino", {
  length: 24,
  separator: " ",
});
// => 'hi-diddly-ho there,...'

_.truncate("hi-diddly-ho there, neighborino", {
  length: 24,
  separator: /,? +/,
});
// => 'hi-diddly-ho there...'

_.truncate("hi-diddly-ho there, neighborino", {
  omission: " [...]",
});
// => 'hi-diddly-ho there, neig [...]'
